snippet: A rainout slowed the Mets’ momentum from an extra-inning victory against Atlanta on Friday. Worse, they had to push back an outing by their most effective starter, Matt Harvey.
abstract: Rainout causes New York Mets to sit pitcher Matt Harvey, their most effective starter, so that pitcher Jon Niese does not go too long between starts.
lead_paragraph: A rainout slowed the Mets’ momentum from an extra-inning victory against Atlanta on Friday. Worse, they had to push back an outing by their most effective starter, Matt Harvey.

headline.seo: Mets’ Harvey Will Get Extra Rest Because of Rain
headline.main: Harvey to Get Extra Rest Because of Rainout
headline.print_headline: Harvey Sits To Keep Niese In Routine
